summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TraderGenie AI Trading Strategy Engine. All requested features are working correctly.
seed_data_creation: None - uses built-in strategies and fallback coin data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working. Scanner uses FALLBACK_COINS when CoinGecko API is rate limited (MOCKED). Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_tradergenie_api.py cover all API endpoints.

rr_box_button.details: R:R Box button is above the chart and shows 'Click to place' when active

market_scanner.details: Scanner returns signals when 'Scan Market' is clicked. Uses fallback data when CoinGecko API is rate limited.

page_scrollability.details: Page is scrollable and Scanner section is visible at the bottom

scanner_grid_layout.details: Scanner panel displays signals in a responsive grid layout (1-5 columns based on screen size)

trade_calculator.details: Trade Calculator shows R:R Ratio, Position Size, Risk Amount, Potential Profit, SL/TP Distance, Quantity, and Liquidation Price

strategy_panel_descriptions.details: Strategy Panel shows descriptions in readable white text (text-white/80 class)

asset_dropdown.details: Asset dropdown works for coin selection - shows 100 options

smc_indicators.details: All SMC indicator buttons work: FVG, BREAKERS, LIQUIDITY, SWINGS, PDH/PDL - overlays display on chart

mocked_apis.CoinGecko_fallback: Scanner uses FALLBACK_COINS (10 static coins) when CoinGecko API is rate limited
mocked_apis.Coinglass_fallback: Derivatives data uses fallback values when COINGLASS_API_KEY is not set
